mean_en: having or showing the ability to easily learn or understand things or to deal with new or difficult situations; having or showing a lot of intelligence
word_etyma: intellig知识界 + ent表示具有...性质的 → 智能型的，有才智的，聪明的
sentence: If you are as intelligent as this scientist, you may change the world.
sentence_trans: 如果你有爱因斯坦那么聪明，你就有可能改变世界。
